Flow Battery Research Collective

  • Fabricating cell components

Fabricating the kit components

Parts

  • 5 M4x10 screws
  • 1 widget

Tools

  • 1 No. 2 Phillips screwdriver

Step 1: Print and post-process the cell bodies and flow frames

  • Get a No. 2 Phillips screwdriver ready
  • Take three M4x10 screws and screw them into the widget

Step 2: Cut the gaskets

  • Find the screwdriver again
  • Take two more M4x10 screws and screw them into the same widget

Cut the membranes, graphite felt, and porous electrodes
